Target: 40
Buttons:
A: Multiply 2 (when red)
B: Subtract 3 (when red)
C: Add 2 (when green)

results.model_answer: A → C → B → C → A → C → A → C → B → C → A → C → A
results.full_model_response: <answer>A → C → B → C → A → C → A → C → B → C → A → C → A</answer>
